de.dfki.lt.hfc.server

Class HfcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.lt.hfc.server.HfcServer

  • public class HfcServer
extends java.lang.Object
    establishes an XML-RPC server for querying information from the repository; starting the server means to call the main method with exactly four arguments
    See Also:
    main()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ForwardChainer hfc
      forward chainer generated from the input args of the main method
      private int port
      the port number for the web server
      private Query query
      the query object generated form the tuple store sitting inside the forward chainer
      private WebServer webServer
      the web server that embodies the XML-RPC server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private HfcServer(java.lang.String[] args)
      called by the main method and is given EXACTLY four arguments: + port number + namespace directory + tuple directory + rule directory NOTE: subdirectories, i.e., recursive embeddings of files are NOT allowed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean isProperFile(java.lang.String name)
      returns true iff the file does NOT start with a '.' and/or ends with a '~'; otherwise false is returned
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      the main method requires EXACTLY four (4) arguments: + 1st arg: port number (int) + 2nd arg: namespace directory (String) + 3rd arg: tuple directory (String) + 4th arg: rule directory (String) call with, e.g., java -server -cp .:../lib/* -Xms800m -Xmx1200m de/dfki/lt/hfc/server/HfcServer 1408 ../resources/namespaces/ ../resources/tuples/ ../resources/rules/
      void startServer()
      starts the server and assigns instance fields hfc and query to the static class fields HFC and QUERY in class HfcServerApi

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • isProperFile

        private boolean isProperFile(java.lang.String name)
        returns true iff the file does NOT start with a '.' and/or ends with a '~'; otherwise false is returned

      • startServer

        public void startServer()
        starts the server and assigns instance fields hfc and query to the static class fields HFC and QUERY in class HfcServerApi
        See Also:
        HfcServerApi.stopServer()

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        the main method requires EXACTLY four (4) arguments: + 1st arg: port number (int) + 2nd arg: namespace directory (String) + 3rd arg: tuple directory (String) + 4th arg: rule directory (String) call with, e.g., java -server -cp .:../lib/* -Xms800m -Xmx1200m de/dfki/lt/hfc/server/HfcServer 1408 ../resources/namespaces/ ../resources/tuples/ ../resources/rules/
